name: The Dream Democracy Monument
description: The Democracy Monument is a public monument in Thailand, referring to democracy. However, the military of Thailand staged a coup eight years ago. Until now, Thailand has been under a military-dominated government. Current The Democracy Monument was represented as expressing tools for many groups, for example, LGBT pride, seeking for state welfare, feminism, pop culture symbol (Harry Potter-themed rally criticizing the monarchy and mocking government with hamster songs). Also, they demanded for abolishment of section 112 (lèse majesté law). Unfortunately, The Democracy Monument in Thailand can be anything except the real Democracy
